sentence.text: This study aims to determine the association between activation of MAPK activity (rs4415084 C>T), positive regulation of cell proliferation (rs2981582 C>T) and cellular response to mechanical stimulus (rs889312 A>C) gene polymorphisms and breast cancer, to analyse the discriminative ability of each SNP and to test the accuracy of the predictive breast cancer risk model which includes all SNPs.
The Random Forest algorithm selected positive regulation of cell proliferation, MAP3K1 and age as important breast cancer predictors.
